location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 35 of 1823 from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire] to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of items sent from Bombay in response to an application from the Resident to meet his requirement to present diplomatic gifts in the course of his work.
